title: Windows10 version 1703 crashes
body: I just updated to win10 version 1703, however when I was in full screen in game, if I hit Alt+Esc trying to get back to my desktop, the whole system crashes. And I have to hold the power button to restart my PC. How to fix this? I tried and find out that this problem only exists in League of legends.

replies.body: It sounds like you're running the latest Windows 10 Creator Update 1703. If that's the case, the creator updates are currently in beta and still have a number of bugs to iron out. That alt+esc issue will probably be fixed if you're able to revert back to the official windows release. If you really want to keep trying that update, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we might be able to troubleshoot!

i have the same problem and thanks to that i got i had leaver boster for the third time in a row its really annoying i'm trying to fix it but i still can't and the result is i need to waste alot more time in a queue thanks to a dumb windows update can't u help me with my punish part ?
I can't even start it up. It says that zlib.dll with another 2 .dll files are incompatible with windows. I give up on this game.
